text: Hi <@UEKMY50SU>, Thanks for the reply. I attached the error.
can you try regenerating your personal access key? i.e. run `hs auth`, deactivate your key and generate a new one (making sure you have the "Serverless Functions"  scope selected)?
at the moment, a `package.json` file only applies to the serverless functions in the `.functions` directory where it is located

could you be more specific about your app and what you're trying to accomplish? serverless functions will create publicly available endpoints that can be accessed through your portal's domain. within these functions you can interact with HubDB in whatever way you need

Thank you very much!
This has made it work now.
I have tried hs auth before but not deleted my key.
